comments.body: I think it would be cool if while wearing this the player can interact with the skulk, so when a skulk sensor in range of the player detects a sound, it would be highlighted for the player, even through walls as you mentioned before.
Great idea!
Interesting... Also, you are very welcome.
Imagine for a minute: you’re stripmining and get jumpscared and then you’re mining trip is ended right then and there

Sharkiesfav3 If you read the whole thing you’d know that I specified something that stops it from doing that. “However it will only do this if it has knowledge that a player exists.” If it does not know that the player exists it will not give the effect. Boom, problem solved.

Also Milk :)
I disagree as this in any form gives players incentives to remove wardens, which mojang has stated that they want the player to run/avoid this creature instead of purposefully battle it.

NeonRexodus i see where you are coming from here, but I still feel like players are gonna cheat the warden, which I dont want to become meta. But I still enjoy your input! Have a nice day/night/existence!

I like this idea, although the Warden is said to not drop anything as to not grant benefits from killing it... It is meant to not be killed basically. But the idea of not placing blocks at all might be a bit too drastic... What if instead it gave a cooldown to blocks, similar to the cooldown of thrown items (Or is that only in the combat snapshot?)
Hi
This would be cool
Would this just eventually become a wool block? Would you be able to combine multiple carpets into one block? I assume not, unless they make it so different slabs could be in the same block

I was about to post this suggestion.  More colors for carpet would be great too, and perhaps textures like Concrete does.  On that note, Concrete should be able to be different levels the same exact way.  In that sense, you would have five ways to make custom height areas.

  1. Snow is obviously already layered
  2. Concrete Powder layered
  3. Concrete can be solidified at any height of powder, but maybe not layered down itself
  4. Carpet layered
  5. Carpet... compacted?

I'd also point out this should not get rid of the full-block variants, like Snow Block, Concrete Block, Wool Block, Powder Block.

I'd also suggest that right-clicking can remove layers from:

  • Snow - Shovel (and shears?)
  • Carpet - Shears
  • Powder - Shovel
  • Concrete - Pickaxe
I was thinking of the same idea!

Great idea! However, I think that the brush is an archeology tool (like the fishing rod is for fishing) and should stay its own separate thing, maybe this could be a new reason to use a hoe? Or maybe some other process

True I was just thinking brush or shears because this is similar to how it works IRL.

This idea could be boiled down to killing two birds with one stone.

1.  Renewable copper

2. On no My copper just rusted further than I wanted
I mean, why not!
I wanted to look like a magic crystal ball.

I think the item would be cool looking, but you are not supposed to fight the Warden. The Warden is supposed to be guarding things and not drop anything. Perhaps your item could be what it is guarding
To prevent the encouragement of griefing aged copper blocks on buildings... The same should be only for the copper block itself, not the cut copper blocks...
Maybe they can be found on mountains like a hermit having a hut of their own, like the witch but a villager.
if you have a idea on how this could be used put it in the comments

I was kind of thinking fur could be a drop from all passive mobs that dont already drop something. Also the rabbit hide should just turn into fur. The fur clothes could be a replacement for leather in the new snowier snow. This would also make it a lot easier to craft bundles and also turn rabbit hide into something actually useful.

This is a pretty good idea Goat and Polar Bear would drop fur and its uses are to make fur boots which gives no armor but immunity to to slippery ice and powdered snow. Another recipe would be 4 fur and it will turn to wool.
I really like this idea :)
Scouting party ? Raid member ? What type of idea is this
Using the horn would spawn goats and attack the area you look at or attack entities after that they would go back to the snow
If you like the idea vote it
I think that’s the plan with pottery fragments. They haven’t released the final designs yet, so some of them may be based on banner designs.

Almost all of this is content that should not exist in a kids game. A necromancer? Death? An arsonist? Also, if you add more bosses, they aren't exactly final, are they?
This should be a mob
there should be a nether boss

Too much. Amethyst should just be purple -- that's its common colourway.

Use texture packs for multi-coloured variants.
No offense.

Frog legs would be great! I think that any opportunity to add slight depth like this should be taken. It can't be that difficult to add and would certainly add to the consistency of the game.

Also any opportunity to add food items is appreciated.

YES! This would be an outstanding feature. Maybe it could work as if copper was "word" (I forgot the word). But make it for stone near water. But not the stone us players placed. But maybe it has to be a river, maybe only a river. But YES! Great idea!
Very good Idea

This would be an AMAZING feature! Like if you have a house on pillars in the middle of a river, maybe they could add a feature where water can break through blocks. This could suggest more ideas on the topic of erosion, such as avalanches, landslides, etc.

But I would love to see something like this actually in-game!
I love this idea! But I think for it to erode the water would have to be flowing (not full block) or in an aquafir or river.
I agree tbh. Good idea.
I think the Ink Sac should be used to make a blindness potion. The Glow Ink Sac should be used to make glowing potions.
Feels like it should create the glowing effect as a potion instead, maybe granting blindness if fermented spider eye is used with it
YES it is just so annoying how both the versions feel like different games
I love that show, also make it look like the studio in the videos.
What's that even supposed to mean? C418's music is already in the game, and there doesn't need to only be one single composer.

New armour shouldn’t be added for the sake of it, netherite, turtle shell helmets and elytras were all added because there different and unique, there’s no reason to add armour for the sake of it, it needs something special or diffrent

I love the idea, maybe it could shed it's blossom or be sheared to have a renewable way to get spore blossoms.
Sure I guess.

This is interesting but at the same time, relatively useless. The only utility I can see is potential glowberry farms. Lush caves are already very easy to find, as are Axolotls. I also feel like the interaction between this and the allay would be unnecessary.
I think it needs something else, it’s just a flying dolphin that drops berries, maybe if it had something else, like a camouflage state it could be fairly interesting
